name: Shattering Blows
summary: Your forceful blows shatter objects with ease.
description:
Your forceful blows shatter objects with ease. While you are raging, your melee Strikes ignore 5 points of an object's Hardness. If you have the devastator class feature, you instead ignore 10 points of an object's Hardness.Traits

Rage: You must be raging to use abilities with the rage trait, and they end automatically when you stop raging.
